captions.text:
Lieutenant dan,
what are you doing here?

Well, thought
I'd try out my sea legs.

Well,
you ain't got no legs,
lieutenant dan.

You wrote me a letter,
you idiot.

I had to see this
for myself...

I told you
if you were ever
a shrimp boat captain,

That I'd be
your first mate.
I'm a man of my word.

That I'm going
to be calling you "sir."

title: Forrest Gump (5/9) Movie CLIP - First Mate (1994) HD

comments.author: Gencturk92

comments.text:
I don't know if anybody else observed it, but this story captures a very 
unique characteristic trait found in few people - Some people never change. 
Like, if they meet their old manager, or team lead or professor even after 
years, they still call them sir/mam the same way.. sometimes, some people 
feel that these kind of people have not matured or have not grown into 
leadership positions or progressed in their career... seems like they still 
remain the same old stupid guy... but in reality, these kind of people are 
really very honest, simple and innocent. They never learn to do politics or 
take advantage of others, while others always take advantage of them and 
grow. It's hard to find such people, and it's a treasure to gain 
love/respect of such.. because it's sincere and it is for life.. ﻿
